titles.title: Cybersecurity for Rural Water Systems Act
Cybersecurity for Rural Water Systems Act
To include cybersecurity technical assistance in the national rural water and wastewater circuit rider program of Department of Agriculture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development
